synopsis.text: Nagisa's unexpected confession and Naoya's audacious proposal set the stage for a unique romantic comedy that challenges conventional norms. High school student Naoya is overjoyed when his long-time crush, Saki, accepts his confession. But just as he begins to revel in his newfound relationship, the charming Nagisa confesses her feelings for him. Unwilling to hurt Nagisa and eager to maintain his bond with Saki, Naoya suggests a love triangle, much to everyone's surprise. As the trio navigates through unconventional territory, they encounter a series of amusing and heartwarming situations that test the strength of their relationship. Will Naoya's daring decision lead to happiness for all, or will it create complications that they never anticipated? Join this extraordinary trio as they embark on a journey filled with laughter, love, and life lessons.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
